alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 04 at 3:05PM PST until March 05 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Mountains. * WHEN...Until midnight PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will likely continue beyond Saturday night into Sunday night, but due to the potential for accumulating snowfall, this advisory may need to be converted to a Winter Weather Advisory.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
